annotations: Furthermore by doing as a student ambassador it helped me improve my speaking and then feel more confident speaking in front of many people Sep 2013 May 2016 Vietnamese Student Network UWE Viet at UWE Bristol Community Team Managing the number of Vietnamese students studying at UWE including personal information in order to help to assist students' needs and concerns Assisting Organizing Team in most of events of the Vietnamese students network such as Tet show UWE Viet's prom new student's welcome Connecting to other Vietnamese Student Network VIETSOCs in other cities within UK March 2012 Sep 2012 Volunteers for Tiep Suc Mua Thi 2012 at International University VNU Volunteer Member Assisting student for the entrance exam for university 2013 IELTS Certificate with score 5.5 issued by British Council 2014 Certificate for achieving Emergency First Aid course by Community Paramedics 2013 2016 Graduated from the University of the West of England Second Class Language English Computer Word Excel Powerpoint ACTIVITIES CERTIFICATIONS HONORS & AWARDS SKILLS INTERESTS Reading Listening music Mr. Jerry Carino General Store Manager of KFC Fitlon Avon Bristol United Kindom Email Zen266901@zen.com Mobile +44 7720 830466 Address The Shield Retail Centre Link Rd Filton Bristol BS34 7BR Mr. Lam Thanh Thep PhD Researcher UWE Bristol Email lamhongnhan2000@yahoo.com Social activities REFERENCES
